Articles.Content:
So years ago, KSP added in well-known “space-related” names for Kerbal like Elon (Musk) Kerman, Buzz (Aldrin) Kerman, Scott (Manley) Kerman,  etc. These fellows would be randomly deposited in the Astronaut Center when you went to go recruit or add more crew members. In addition, at some point during development, I think around the time comm networks were added, that the devs mounted a community bug-hunting contest and those of us who had submitted detailed bug reports that provided usable info to correct the bug got entered into a random drawing to name a Kerbal.

So my questions is, did those legacy names get kept “in circulation” to appear when we recruit random new Kerbals to our crew in KSP 2?
